    • Uses of ReceiveOrSendSynchronization in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients

      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients that return ReceiveOrSendSynchronization 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReceiveOrSendSynchronization Client.send(Class connectionKey, Object object)
      Behaves similar to the Client.send(Object) method with the exception, that it takes the connectionKey of an existing Connection to be send over this Connection instead.
      ReceiveOrSendSynchronization Client.send(Connection connection, Object object)
      Behaves similar to the Client.send(Object) method with the exception, that it takes the concrete Connection the given Object should be send over.
      ReceiveOrSendSynchronization Client.send(Object object)
      This Method will try to send an Object over an Connection.
